mapper.sql: id, author, type, title, time, star, commentNum, readNum
mapper.insert:
insert into article
id,
author,
type,
title,
time,
star,
commentNum,
readNum,
content,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{star,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update article
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
star = #{star,jdbcType=INTEGER},
commentNum = #{commentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
readNum = #{readnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update article set author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, star = #{star,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commentNum = #{commentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, readNum = #{readnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update article set author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, star = #{star,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commentNum = #{commentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, readNum = #{readnum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
